meanings.definition: A device in a vehicle that measures the distance traveled on a particular journey.
meanings.sent1: The tripmeters in the car showed we had driven 100 miles.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to reset the tripmeters before starting a new road trip.
meanings.sent3: The tripmeters in the old van were so worn out, they started counting backwards!
meanings.sent4: Her love for adventure was like a set of tripmeters, always ticking away the miles.
meanings.sent5: The bright red numbers on the tripmeters glowed in the dark car interior.
